original: Jörstad, Olof Malte, postmästare, Laholm, f. 23/12/89 i Lund. G. 17 ni. fd. telegr:exp. Annie Österdahl. Barn: Jörgen f. 18, civ:ing., lantmät. — Delt. i postv. kurs i tyska 22-24, adm. kurs 44. E. o. postexp. i s. distr. 09, e. postexp. där 12, po6texp. i Hässleholm 14, i Kristianstad 15, åter i Hässleholm 16, postassist. där 25, förste dito 36, po.stmäst. i Markaryd 41, i Laholm sed. 44. GMnr 8 st.
translated: Jörstad, Olof Malte, postmaster, Laholm, born on December 23, 1889 in Lund. Married on November 17, with former telegraph expert Annie Österdahl. Children: Jörgen born in 1918, civil engineer, surveyor. Participated in postal courses in German in 1922-1924, administrative courses in 1944. Acting postal clerk in the southern district in 1909, appointed postal clerk there in 1912, postal clerk in Hässleholm in 1914, in Kristianstad in 1915, back to Hässleholm in 1916, postal assistant there in 1925, first assistant in 1936, postmaster in Markaryd in 1941, in Laholm since 1944. Awarded the 8th class of the Order of the Sword.
